sourceMeaningMnemonic: <radical>Tiger</radical>s and <radical>wolverine</radical>s have one big thing in common and it's that the government likes to <kanji>oppress</kanji> them. It doesn't matter if you're the animal or a mutant X-Men hybrid. The government will go out of its way to oppress you if you are one.
meaningInfo: Imagine being a tiger or a wolverine or a tiger-wolverine and being oppressed by the government just because you're different. Imagine being stuck in a cage. Not being allowed to vote. It's awful!
readingMnemonic: Tiger and wolverine people are so <kanji>oppress</kanji>ed that the only thing they're allowed to amuse themselves with is <reading>Gak</reading> (<ja>ぎゃく</ja>). You know, that weird goo they made us play with when we were kids? Well that's not so fun when it's all you have.
readingInfo: Imagine being a tiger/wolverine girl and being so oppressed that you can only sit in a cage, playing with goopy Gak all day. This blows...
